name: Fruit Bounty
description:
Cut! Cut! Cut! Cut fruit!
All you need to do is cutting the fruit crazy!

How do play?
Throw darts at the right time, Hit the target!
Keep cutting fruits to get higher rewards!
Remember not to throw empty darts!
You can play anywhere and have unlimited fun!

FEATURES:
-Variety of fruits.
-free to play!
-Simple but full of challenges.
-More surprises.

Throw darts! Don't miss anything! Let’s Go Now!
